connection.label: Connection String
connection.help: Connection String for the Oracle Server format - [host]:[port]/[sid or service name].

schema.label: User Schema
schema.help: (Optional) User Schema in the Oracle Database where data will be written into.

table.label: Table
table.help: Table name in the Oracle Database where data will be written into.

field_mapping.label: Field Mapping
field_mapping.help: List of the Table Fields/Columns. Input for this field is in JSON format {"(field_name)" : {"source_field" : "value", "data_type": "value", "format": "value"}}. field_name will be the name of the column in the Oracle Table, source_field (required) value will be the name of the field in the JSON Data passed to the plugin, data_type (optional) there are 6 available data types that will convert data to it's proper type before saving we have String, Integer, Float, Boolean, Timestamp and Date, format is only available for Timestamp & Date data_type this will allow users to format the date/time before saving i.e. (yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff) kindly refer to the MomentJS docs for more details.
